settings.text: We excel at transforming cherished gems into modern engagement ring settings, subject to specific conditions. Choose to deconstruct an existing family ring or set a loose heirloom diamond into a contemporary VM setting, renewing history with a sustainable touch in recycled metals. Elevate your style while preserving sentimental value.

settings.title: 1. Consultation
settings.content: Join us in person or virtually to discuss rings that fit what you're looking for. During your 30 minute appointment we’ll help with any questions, show you ring settings that match your lifestyle and aesthetic, and determine what types of diamonds and gemstones will meet your preferences. Our custom work starts at $3,500 and typically ranges in the $4,000 - $15,000 range.

settings.title: 2. Stone Sourcing & Initial Deposit
settings.content: We require a $250 non-refundable procurement fee to begin searching for your perfect gem through our trusted network of gemstone and diamond dealers. Our team will present you with stone options and you will choose one for your custom ring. The time it takes to find your stone may be increased for harder-to-come-by stones. Once you select your stone from our curated options, we will draft your deposit invoice and send you our Custom Order Contract.

settings.title: 3. CAD review/approval
settings.content: We will share with you digital mock-ups (called CAD renderings) of your ring to review and approve via email. Up to two adjustments are allowed before additional CAD fees of $250 are requested.

settings.title: 4. Production (4-6 wks)
settings.content: Once you approve your design, we will spend the next few weeks casting, polishing, and setting stones. We will send you an update when the ring is completely finished.

settings.title: 5. Final Payment & Delivery
settings.content:
The last and most exciting step! You will be invoiced for the remaining balance. After your final payment we will have your ring shipped or ready for in-store pickup.

We will provide you with a lovely ring box, ring material documentation, information on our warranty, care and cleaning. We are happy to offer complimentary cleanings and check-ups on your ring for a lifetime.

settings.text:
1. We will assess your diamond to ensure it will be good fit to reset. It is common for heirloom diamond clarity characteristics to include, but not be limited to, chips, nicks, and abrasions. Please note, some heirloom settings do not permit the identification of certain clarity characteristics until after unsetting the stone. 
  2. All of your stone's clarity characteristics will be disclosed. If the diamond passes the assessment, the next step is to confirm details of the setting and sign the Heirloom Rework Liability contract. We take every measure to ensure it's safety along the way.
  3. Once approved, you will pay the full balance for the rework and any applicable fees.We will proceed with unsetting your stone (if necessary), sending you CAD designs for approval and casting and setting the new ring!
  4. After 3-4 weeks, the ring is completed and ready to enjoy! All unused metal and small accent diamonds will be returned to you.
